definitions.definition: Any of numerous hemiparasitic evergreen plants of the order Santalales with white berries that grow in the crowns of apple trees , oaks , and other trees , such as the European mistletoe ( Viscum album ) and American mistletoe or eastern mistletoe ( Phoradendron leucarpum ).
A sprig of one such plant used as a Christmas decoration , associated with the custom that a man may kiss any woman standing beneath it.

main_definition: ( countable , uncountable ) Any of numerous hemiparasitic evergreen plants of the order Santalales with white berries that grow in the crowns of apple trees , oaks , and other trees , such as the European mistletoe ( Viscum album ) and American mistletoe or eastern mistletoe ( Phoradendron leucarpum ).
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable ) A sprig of one such plant used as a Christmas decoration , associated with the custom that a man may kiss any woman standing beneath it.
